titleInfo.title: Supplementary Material for "Sonification of Multi-Channel Image Data"

mods.abstract: The following sound files present a series of marker pattern sonifications for a set of 4 cells. The first and fourth cell express the same proteins on their surface which easily perceived as an identical sound pattern.
